products.title: Meadow Lark Natural Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Meadow lark natural roller blind in cream/brown. Made to measure from 15.13 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Light and bright, the meadow lark roller blind is ideal for enhancing a minimalist interior. The grey and white hues of the fabric are simple and versatile and will look sleek and clean at your windows, whilst the pretty wildflower design adds a touch of traditional charm. As well as looking great, this window blind also boasts pollen and dust mite reducing qualities.
 
 Product id: db-rbx2020 fabric colour: lark natural material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Meadow Nightingale Blue Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Meadow nightingale blue roller blind in blue. Made to measure from 15.13 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
White on blue creates such a striking and classic contrast that helps to make this stylish window blind really pop. The meadow nightingale roller blind features a pollergen treated fabric with a gorgeous design of wild flowers. This window blind is a smart and decorative way to bring peaceful shading to any family space.
 
 Product id: db-rbx2021 fabric colour: nightingale blue material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Meadow Dove Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Meadow dove grey roller blind in grey. Made to measure from 15.13 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Add a chic touch of decoration to your windows and complement a modern scheme with this print of flora in cool grey and white tones. The meadow dove roller blind will bring both comfort and classic style to your space thanks to the graceful motif displayed on pollergen treated fabric.

products.title: Country Meadow, Natural - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Country meadow, natural - roller blind as you immerse yourself in the quaint and calm stylings of country meadow natural you come to realise just how much there is to see and explore. The subtle infusion of colour allows you to feel at ease and at peace t
products.productdescription: As you immerse yourself in the quaint and calm stylings of country meadow natural you come to realise just how much there is to see and explore. The subtle infusion of colour allows you to feel at ease and at peace the moment you walk through the door. The finishing piece to your new homely little bolthole. If you want to add the perfect blend of contemporary style meets country chic, why not use natural in the kitchen? It has everything you need to make the heart of the home the space you never want to leave.

products.title: Country Meadow, Dusk - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Country meadow, dusk - roller blind when you take a look at country meadow dusk you're instantly transported to a calmer place. The gently textured fabric sits elegantly in the background, serving as the perfect foundation on which to display a true symph
products.productdescription: When you take a look at country meadow dusk you're instantly transported to a calmer place. The gently textured fabric sits elegantly in the background, serving as the perfect foundation on which to display a true symphony of colours. The great thing about dusk is that it allows you to take your decor in a variety of new and exciting directions. We love the idea of using it on the upstairs landing to add that homely touch to one of the more difficult to perfect spaces. Add a vase of fresh cut flowers on the windowsill and a runner along the floor and you'll be all set.

products.title: Country Meadow, Fresh - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Country meadow, fresh - roller blind if you look closely at their new country meadow fresh fabric you come to appreciate the artisan skill that goes into intricately layering the colours. They seem to ebb and flow, this way and that, giving the fabric a lif
products.productdescription: If you look closely at their new country meadow fresh fabric you come to appreciate the artisan skill that goes into intricately layering the colours. They seem to ebb and flow, this way and that, giving the fabric a life of its own as they do so. Matching to meadow fresh is all about being flexible with the other colours you introduce. A neutral beige is the ideal colour for the new living room carpet, whilst a light mint feature wall would also make for an inspiring finishing touch.

products.title: Meadow Lark Natural Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Meadow lark natural electric roller blind in cream/brown. Made to measure from 153.92 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Combining luxury and convenience, the meadow lark electric roller blind will improve any space. The light and uplifting design of white wildflowers on grey will look the part in a range of settings, whether sleek and minimalist or country chic. With an electric design, this blind can be operated remotely and is made with pollergen treated fabric for added comfort.
 
 Product id: db-erbx2020 fabric colour: lark natural material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes
